Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse, the interior is partially covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of two lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394263) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394263)
